big pharma.ability: Grants +%s HEMISYNC RECOVERY at end of round.
big pharma.description: Unveil the hidden agendas of pharmaceutical giants.
big pharma.lore_1: Some believe that major pharmaceutical companies are more interested in profits than in public health.
big pharma.lore_2: It's alleged that they suppress natural remedies and keep people dependent on expensive drugs.
big pharma.lore_3: This control extends to influencing medical research and regulatory bodies.

atlantis.description: Discover the lost city beneath the waves.
atlantis.lore_1: Atlantis is said to be an advanced civilization that sank into the ocean thousands of years ago.
atlantis.lore_2: Legends claim it was home to incredible technology and wisdom before its mysterious disappearance.
atlantis.lore_3: Some explorers and theorists believe remnants of Atlantis could still be found in the depths of the sea.

mandela effect.description: Reality seems to shift - or does it?
mandela effect.lore_1: The Mandela Effect describes collective misremembering of common events or details.
mandela effect.lore_2: Examples include the spelling of certain words or logos, or the altered existence of historical figures or events.
mandela effect.lore_3: Some believe this phenomenon is due to alternate realities or parallel dimensions.

new world order.ability: Grants +%s ALL SEEING EYE to deck.
new world order.description: A secret elite controlling global events.
new world order.lore_1: The New World Order theory suggests a secretive group aims to rule the world through a one-world government.
new world order.lore_2: The leaders of each nation have more in common with each other than with their own people.
new world order.lore_3: It has always been the tendency of power to concentrate in the hands of the few.

orbs.ability: Summons ORB to guard you KUNDALINI, Attacks enemies for %s damage.
orbs.description: Mysterious lights that appear to have a will of their own.
orbs.lore_1: Orbs are often seen as symbols of spiritual or supernatural forces.
orbs.lore_2: Some believe they can be used for telepathy or communication with extraterrestrial beings.
orbs.lore_3: Others see them as harbingers of impending disasters or warnings from higher powers.

nibiru.description: The rogue planet that could doom us all.
nibiru.lore_1: Nibiru is a mythical planet that some believe is on a collision course with Earth.
nibiru.lore_2: Some believe it's a rogue planet that could cause catastrophic damage to our planet.
nibiru.lore_3: Others see it as a symbol of impending doom or a warning from the universe.

antarctica.lore_1: Antarctica might hide ancient civilizations, alien bases, or Nazi hideouts, according to some theories.
antarctica.lore_2: The nations of the world, which typically bicker and fight, have a unified front when it comes to Antarctica.
antarctica.lore_3: What are they hiding?, why can't we go there?

psyops.description: Mind games on a massive scale.
psyops.lore_1: Psychological Operations (Psyops) involve using propaganda and misinformation to influence populations.
psyops.lore_2: The people in power don't care about the truth, they care about control.
psyops.lore_3: USAID is a CIA front company that has been funding the media for decades. True journalism died long ago.

majestic twelve.description: The secret committee behind UFO cover-ups.
majestic twelve.lore_1: Majestic 12, or MJ-12, was formed by President Truman to investigate UFOs.
majestic twelve.lore_2: The group is said to have hidden evidence of extraterrestrial life and technology. Both from the public and the government.
majestic twelve.lore_3: It begs the question, who has the power to keep even the president in the dark?
